Text:
Hi HDvideos,

Thank you very much for the english subs. I was waiting for it for so long. I am from Punjab and only knows Punjabi, Hindi and English. But I am a big fan of Telugu, Tamil, Malayalam and Kannada movies. Can't watch these movies without subs.

Thanks again for the upload and subs. Looking forward for more movies with eng subs from you.

I have a request. Can you please upload Pawan Kalyan's Panjaa with eng subs? I know it is a lot of work to write eng subs but If you can that would be great.

Thanks again dude........ U rock
